definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

sentences.english: Chen Wenjie holds geminate leg maimed person, climbing beggar arrive for Chen Qingyun capital.
sentences.chinese: 陈文杰装成双腿残废，爬着要饭供陈青云到京城。

sentences.english: The government did not give them money, forcing them to scrounge for food.
sentences.chinese: 政府没有给他们钱，他们只能去要饭。

sentences.english: There are always some beggars dressed in filthly clothes hanging around the subway stations.
sentences.chinese: 在地铁车站总有一些穿戴邋遢衣服的要饭的人停留。

sentences.english: Many people went begging in the old society.
There is a beggar in frond of the building in the school.
sentences.chinese: 学校的大楼前面有一个要饭的。

sentences.english: Before long, his widow and children were in rags, begging on the streets.
sentences.chinese: 不久，他的妻儿们就衣裳褴褛，要到街上要饭了。
既然是要饭的，就必不会挑肥拣瘦。

sentences.english: Every day they went to the road nearby and stood there begging.
sentences.chinese: 他们每天到附近的大路上去，站在那里要饭。

sentences.english: He says beggars mustn't be choosers.
sentences.chinese: 他说，要饭的哪能挑挑拣拣。

sentences.english: But not for the same reason, " she said. "I thought you were a beggar. "
sentences.chinese: 但是原因不一样，我以为你是个要饭的。

sentences.english: Say the unit not good, the beggar is too more wealthy than it.
sentences.chinese: 说单位不好，要饭的也比它富裕。

sentences.english: A beggar knocked at the door.
sentences.chinese: 一个要饭的人敲了一下门。

sentences.english: "Little better than a beggar, " said the Town Councillors.
sentences.chinese: “的确比要饭的强不了多少，”市参议员们附和着说。

sentences.english: Soon after, another man showed up asking for a meal.
sentences.chinese: 那以后不久，又来个要饭的。

sentences.english: He doesn't think much about his past life as a beggar in the streets of Saigon.
sentences.chinese: 他不多想过去在西贡街上要饭的生活。

definition: to make a hard living as unskilled laborer
to go begging/to ask for alms
lit. drink the northwest wind (idiom); cold and hungry
to starve to death/to be very hungry
to escape from a famine/to get away from a famine-stricken region
variant of 叫花子[jiao4 hua1 zi5]
